findings.title: QSP-2 Missing Funds
findings.description: Contributors will not be able to withdraw their tokens after the minimum threshold is reached due to a `require` statement on L103 in the `withdrawTokens()` function.

findings.title: Remove the accountStarTRAC() function to reduce human error and gas costs.
findings.description: Removing the accountStarTRAC() function can reduce human error and gas costs by incorporating its logic into withdrawTokens().

findings.title: Code Documentation: Inadequate Function Description
findings.description: Each function should at least have a brief description of its purpose and a description of each input and output parameter.
